app.ExcelToMiddle(classNum, placement)¶
app.changeCount(classNum)¶
app.checkAllPaired(classNum)¶
app.checkValid(classNum, combo)¶

Check if current combo have same pair as previous combos

app.getTable(classNum, placement)¶

This function reads 2D array in databases/<classNum>.txt Args:

classNum (str) : eg. “2-1” placement (str) : eg. “database”

Returns:

boolean[][] : 2d array

app.newSet(classNum)¶

reset the 2D array in database overwrite a new (empty, without anyone being paired) 2D array

app.openClass(classNum)¶
app.openList(classNum)¶
app.producePair(classNum)¶

  1. Create new pair

  2. if pairing did not satisfy, try again

  3. record the array of satisfied combos to middle.txt

  4. return the string of paired names

app.readCount(classNum)¶
app.readEx(classNum)¶
app.readName(classNum)¶

read the names of the Student List return names as string

app.recordFinalPair(classNum)¶
app.recordValidCombo(classNum, validCombo, placement)¶
app.refresh(label, window, newText)¶

refresh the screen of names

app.reset(classNum)¶
app.saveFile(fileName, theWidget)¶
app.toExcel(classNum, placement)¶
